inn1.comm: swings it in and he gets forward and pushes it to the off side
this was outside off and he played it with soft hands down to third man, the fielder slides and cuts it off
keeps him forward and he punches it down to mid-off
this was fuller and a bit too straight, mid-on was a few yards in front and he whammed it along the ground down to long-on
keeps it on the stumps and he gets across and defends
tucks him up for room and Dilshan punches it to mid-off and tells Kusal to stay back
gives him a bit of width outside off and he can only punch it to point
good length on the stumps and he tucks it away to the on side
he oversteps, he stays beside the line and he punches it to the off side
Free Hit: Doesn't miss out! Length ball on the off stump and asking to be thrashed, he pulls over midwicket and well placed as well as he played it wide of the fielder there
good length swinging on the pads and he works it to the leg side
nice line, just a shade outside off and moving away and he leaves it alone
length ball outside the off stump and he pushes it to the off side
full and moving away and pushes it to the off side
tucks him up for room and he punches it hard back to the bowler
this was a big slash, this was full and moving away and only two slips, would have needed two more actually, outside edge races to third man
goes the other direction this time, Dilshan knew the fine leg was up, Steyn fed him too straight and he he swiveled and pulled it to fine leg
this was full and moving away, he doesn't move his feet at all and slashes and misses
he had the width to drive but ended up placing it straight to McLaren at cover
this was full and moving away and he punches it to the off side
moving away and he punched it down to mid-off
good length on middle and off and he gets an inside edge to the pads

that was a very soft dismissal! This was drifting on the pads and Kusal shuffled and looked to tuck it to the on side, too early on the shot and the ball lobbed tamely to short midwicket, you could have caught that with your eyes shut
fullish in length and he defends to the off side
defends with soft hands to the off side
top class placement, this was a length ball moving away and Dilshan merely pushes it through the line without playing at it too hard, off the middle and wide of mid-off

Steyn drops  it, and he is getting some treatment from the physio, Dilshan stabbed it back to the bowler through the line and it came to him in a flash, struck him on the finger and he went down immediately
comes round the wicket and he has a slip, he gets forward and drives
he drifts down the leg side and it's wide, sweeps and doesn't time it too well
doesn't miss out this time, tossed up and he comes down the track and lofts him over mid-off
another poor ball, too wide down the leg side and he shuffles and clips it wide of short fine leg
he drifts full on the pads and Sangakkara tucks it down to fine leg
this was fuller and wide outside off and he plays the square drive down to third man
we've seen a few of these drives down the ground already, this was a half volley on the off stump, Sangakkara turns the bat slightly and he drills it down to long-on
gets behind the line and pushes it back to the bowler
good length on the stumps and he pushes it to mid-on
he drifts too straight on the stumps and he whips it away wide of square leg
Morkel over the wicket to the left-hander, forces him on the back foot and he pushes it softly to the off side
gives him a hint of width outside the off stump and he punches it to the off side
this was a sharp bouncer, he has Dilshan swaying back to evade it
slashed over slip! He had the width to flay at it and he gave it everything, the extra muscle on that helped in clearing Kallis at first slip
gets across and punches it wide of cover
gets away with one that was short and wide, he chops it to the off side
gets away again, he reaches out and ends up chopping it down to mid-off
doesn't get away this time, this was short and not the quickest surface, he had the time to swivel and pull him over square leg
this was fuller on the stumps and pushed down to mid-on
this was drifting on the pads and he clips it to fine leg
he bangs in the bouncer and Sangakkara quickly ducks under that one
he bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls to square leg
that was too wide outside the off stump, Amla was fielding in front of point and Dilshan hit it hard on the ground and the ball bounced over Amla and raced away
he stays behind the line and punches it away
he gets across and works it away to midwicket

caught down the leg side and that's the big wicket, Morkel dug it in short down the leg side and Sangakkara was looking to pull, the ball got high on him and the ball brushed his glove first, he walked
he bangs it in short from round the wicket and he quickly ducks under it

Thirimanne had to hurry there, this was full and he hammers it hard down the track and clears the bowler, calls quickly and his partner had to step on it as the mid-on fielder gathered and aimed at the strikers' end
fullish on the pads and he tucks it away to the on side
this was fullish outside the off stump and he drives hard to cover
gets forward to a fuller ball and he drives to mid-off
he drifts on the pads and he clips it to fine leg to bring up his fifty, this innings so far has pretty much been about one man
he drifts on the body and he tucks it to the on side
he drops this one short and he stays back and thumps it wide of cover
flatter one and he comes forward to defend
the googly and it keeps low, he gets an outside edge
on the pads and he works it down to deep midwicket
that was a half tracker and he gets away with it, Dilshan's pull finds deep midwicket
another short one and pulled by Thirimanne, he pulls him to deep square leg
this was a good length on the stumps and he pushes it to mid-on
clips it towards mid-on and tells his partner to wait
full and drifting in and he punches it towards mid-off
he drifts too wide down the leg side and wide called
now he sprays it too wide outside off this time, too wide for Dilshan to chase it
good running, he picked a full ball and pushed it towards mid-on and set off quickly, the fielder was under pressure and he failed to pick up properly
he comes round the wicket and he defends on the back foot
a bit too straight and on the pads, he works it to midwicket
fuller ball on the pads and he pushes it to the on side
the googly and it is short and keeps low, he mistimes the pull to long-on
fuller on the stumps and he drives him to long-off
he comes forward and dead bats it
another googly and he punches it wide of point
flatter and he punches it back to the bowler
tucks him up for room and he stays behind the line to defend
good length outside off and he punches it to the off side wide of point
looked like the slower one, looked to clip it away to the leg side and he got an inside edge
full and wide outside off and he plays the square drive to deep point
bowls this full on the stumps and he drills it to cover
that should make him feel a lot better, this was short and wide outside off and he punched it in front of square and found the big gap
round the wicket and on the pads, worked down to short fine leg
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
tossed up on the pads and he works it to the on side
comes down the track and he pushes it to the off side
fuller and driven just wide of mid-off
fuller in length and clipped down to midwicket
round the wicket and he stays behind the line and defends solidly
drifts on the pads and easily worked away to fine leg
this was too wide outside off and he punches him down to sweeper cover
he bangs that in short from round the wicket, quickly ducks under that one
keeps it straight and doesn't give him any room, he can only defend
drifts a bit on the stumps and he softly tucks it away
fuller and wider and he stays beside the line and pushes it to the off side
he uses his feet and works him away towards midwicket where McLaran fumbles
flatter and he comes forward to defend
McLaren is not enjoying himself at deep midwicket! Dilshan had pushed it towards that position and had set himself up for two, he set out for the second and McLaren fumbled yet again
down the track and driven back to the bowler
driven back to Duminy with more firmness this time
bangs it in short and he swivels and pulls him down to deep square leg
short of a length and he defends solidly high on the bat
teased him this time by dropping it fuller and inducing the drive, too early on the shot and beaten
the intention was to bounce him out but it was drifting wide down leg and Thirimanne went for the hook and controlled it well, down to fine leg
fullish outside the off stump and he drives to the off side
he gets behind the line and drives to the off side
fuller in length and he drives him to long-off
tucked away off the pads to the on side
fuller and driven hard back to the bowler
he stays back and punches it down the ground to long-on
slower through the air and worked wide of square leg
flatter and shorter and he punches it wide of point
good length outside the off stump  and he stays beside the line and works it to deep point
looks to tuck it away to the on side but gets an inside edge to the pad
fuller outside the off stump and he pushes it hard to mid-off
shuffles and checks his drive to mid-on
good length on the stumps and he stabs it down to mid-off
shows the full face of the bat and drives but Philander intercepts it
low full toss and he drills it down to long-off
down the track and he gets to the pitch of the ball and drives to long-off
flatter and pushed to the off side
flatter one and he punches it to point
flatter and punched down to long-off
down the track and pushes a full toss to long-off and that brings up the fifty stand
solidly punched and extra cover does well to dive and get a hand to it and deflect it away
fuller on the stumps and he drills it hard down the track
he oversteps and it's a slower ball, gets an outside edge  towards third man, second overstep by Philander
the Free Hit finds the rope but not how or where he intended it, he walked down the track and looked to slog and got an inside edge that sneaked past the stumps and de Kock
this was convincing! This was short and rising on him and Thirimanne adjusted well, hopped at the crease and gently guided it down to third man
he works it away to the on side
on the pads and he shuffles and clips it to square leg

Tahir gets away with a short one and Thirimanne had only himself to blame here, it was asking to be hit over the on side but the batsman got the placement all wrong, Amla was at deep midwicket and he didn't have to move much, bends and takes it comfortably
he bowls him a googly and he defends
this one straightened and sneaked past the edge, de Kock got a bit excited
length ball and he pushed it to the off side
punched back to the bowler and Tahir flung it back, thankfully his aim was lousy
gets well forward and works a full toss to long-on
down the track and he tucks it to midwicket
continues round the wicket, drops it on the pads and he flicks
fuller and driven down to long-on
stays back and tucks it to fine leg
stays back and punches to the off side
this one skidded through and beat him as he looked to cut
fuller in length and he drives
flatter and he gets forward to defend
Mahela is happy to get forward and defends
flatter and he opens the face and dabs it to short third man
drifts on the pads and he nearly edged the googly to the keeper
flatter one and he works it to square leg
gets on his knee and sweeps him down to short fine leg
he stays back and works it back to the bowler
flatter one and he comes forward to defend
down the track and he works it to mid-on where, of all people, AB de Villiers misfields
he makes room and looks to cut it wide of short third man but can't beat the man
full outside off and pushed to the off side
the googly and Jayawardene gets an inside edge to the leg side
he stays back and tucks it to the on side
full outside off and he pushes it wide of cover

Jayawardene is given out lbw and he has been given out and he is reviewing it, it was a flatter one and he looked to sweep, the ball struck the bottom of the pad in front of middle stump but he immediately reviewed it, the question was whether the ball hit the inside edge or not, they don't seem to have Hot Spot, after a long wait the decision is reversed, the ball did deviate before strikng the pad and Steve Davis upstairs was convinced
fuller and he works it to long-on
short and wide outside off and punched down to backward point, sliding stop
good length on the stumps and he stays back and defends
he stays back and punches it away towards point
he stays back and he works it to the leg side
nearly edged this one, this was short and rising up and had Dilshan fishing at it
fullish on the pads and he works it to fine leg
he gets forward and drives to cover
down the track and he drives to long-off
low full toss and he works it away to midwicket
flatter one and he drills it back to the bowler
the googly and cut away, two fielders converge and backward point slides and deflects it
fuller and worked to deep square leg where Faf cuts it off, Steyn is still off the field
good length outside off and punched to the off side
not the right length, this was dragged short from outside off and he swivels and pulls him firmly down to deep midwicket, to wide of the fielder
this was fuller and drilled back to the bowler
fuller outside off and he angles it to the off side
a classic Mahela shot but only a single, he was expecting a short one from Morkel, arched backwards and guided it over slip, third man picked up
fuller and worked to the leg side
drifting on the pads and he works it towards midwicket and he fumbles
he stays back and works it to the leg side

Dilshan's out bowled but somehow he's not convinced, Duminy was bowling from round the wicket, Dilshan was looking to sweep, the ball struck the off bail, Dilshan didn't really see how he was bowled and hung around for a few seconds, the ball deflected off the glove to the stumps
over the wicket and he pushes it to the off side
shuffles and tucks it to the on side
drifts on the pads and he works it behind square, Mahela walks the single, reminds me of Arjuna
he stays beside the line and he pushes it to the off side
close call for Mahela as he gets an inside edge to the pads, the ball was coming back in
he drifts a bit on the pads and he works it to deep midwicket, SA could have run him out had Morkel stood behind the stumps, Mahela was jogging, lazy cricket all round
lands it outside off and he safely leaves it alone
flatter one and he gets forward and defends
tossed up and he comes forward and knocks it to the on side
he drifts wide down leg and looks to paddle it away
down the track and he chips it high over midwicket
he goes back at the crease and pushes it to the off side
drifts on the body and he clips it to the on side
good length on the stumps and he stays back and defends
a bit too straight and he clips it to fine leg where Tahir picks up and throws awkwardly, loses his balance
gets forward and pushes it towards mid-off and the calling and running is good
punches it to the off side and thinks of a single
gives him width and he opens the face and dabs it to third man
on the pads and he works it to fine leg
round the wicket and he comes forward to defend
flatter one and he stays back and works it to the on side
this is too wide down the leg side
full on the pads and he works it to midwicket
stays back and clips with the turn to square leg
good length on the pads and he works it to fine leg
doesn't give him room, he stays behind the line and defends
that was a shot of intent, McLaren dropped it short and that didn't deter Mathews from giving the charge and lofting it down the ground, over long-on, made it look quite easy
full outside off and driven down to cover
full and swinging in, he closes the face of the bat and works it away to deep midwicket
he opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
short and wide outside off and he cuts him down to sweeper cover
fuller in length and he gets forward and across and defends
looks to play straighter but gets an inside edge to the on side
gives him width and he opens the face of the bat and angles it to third man
he makes room to a short ball and slashes and plays it uppishly to third man
he opens the face of the bat and runs it down to third man
this was short and wide outside off and cut straight to backward point
it's the slower bouncer but down the leg side
low full toss on the pads and he works it away to deep midwicket
this is a low full toss and he drills it down to long-on
this was short and wide and he made himself room and slashed it towards third man, on the bounce, shouts of 'catch it'
low full toss outside off and he drives straight to cover
he fires that full outside off and he tries to dig it out
slower through the air and clipped to the on side
flatter one and punched down to long-on, Tahir dives
the googly, he clips it with the turn to deep midwicket
flatter and quicker and clipped wide of square leg, there were yells of 'keeper, keeper' and Mahela thought of a second but was sent back
punched back to the bowler and well fielded by Tahir
he drags it short and he swivels looking to pull but can't beat short fine leg
this was short and wide outside off and Mathews made room and slapped it over point, huge gap there, this pitch is slow
low full toss and he flicks it softly to midwicket
this was a low full toss, he fetches it from outside off and he drags it to the leg side
this was a low full toss and he works it to midwicket
slower bouncer and he made room and withdrew the shot, it cleared Mahela and wide called
makes room and squirts out a yorker to point
lovely sweep from Mahela as gets his front leg well outside off and  he hits it well wide of short fine leg. Easy two
leans forward and nudges it into the vacant square leg region
it's the reverse sweep this time, well chosen shot considering the ball had been skid down the off side. But Mathews can't quite connect well enough to beat short third man

what a shot! That's the best example of how good Mahela's hands are. He'd yorked himself going for the reverse sweep and yet he's found the boundary and the ball was well outside leg too. Such silken wrists
pushed down to long-on calmly
flatter ball on and around off stump, he dabs to short third man
this was full and moving in and he works it to long-on
this was short outside off and he opens the face and dabs it to third man
he drops it short and he swivels and pulls it to deep midwicket
short and wide outside off and he slashes and misses
full outside off and he looks to crash it down the ground but finds mid-off
full toss and he comes down the pitch and smashes it straight to deep cover
full on the stumps and worked to the on side

ouch! The umpire Nigel Llong gets in the way of Faf's throw! This was clipped down to deep square leg and the batsmen had clearly settled just for a single, Faf ran to his right, picked up and attempted a stylish flick on the dive but Llong had no clue what was to hit him, flush on the arm and Faf was embarassed, all's well
he clips it towards midwicket
tossed up and Jayawardene had made room to scoop it over the off side but he didn't read the googly and the ball crashed middle and leg
gets off the mark by dabbing the ball down to third man, the fielder dives and picks up
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
nips back in and he taps it to the off side
drags it short and he fetches it from outside off and pulls him down to deep midwicket
frustration for McLaren, slip was wide and there was a huge gap between keeper and slip and Priyanjan found that gap, wide ball and he gets an outside edge to third man
on the pads and he works it to square leg
slower ball wide outside off and he slashes and misses
full outside off and he drags it to the off side
he drifts far too wide outside off
on the pads and he clips it to the on side
the googly and he stays back and clips it to midwicket
softly tucks it towards midwicket
down the track and he drills this back to the bowler
fetches it from the stumps and slogs it to midwicket
stays back and clips with the turn to midwicket
doesn't give him room and he stays back and punches it back to the bowler
the fuller ball on the stumps and he plays the pickup shot, across the line and there's work for deep square leg
cleared the rope this time! This was a length ball outside off and in the slot, stays at the crease and lofts him downtown over long-on
back to back boundaries, this was a length ball on middle and off and he swings him over midwicket, the fielder was up
full outside off and he drills it to the off side
full on the pads and he works it down to fine leg
he fires this wide outside off and full, he fails to dig it out

that was more a Test match dismissal, McLaren bowled it on the corridor of uncertainty, Mathews was cramped for room, feet not moving and thick outside edge to the keeper, the sort of dismissal on the first morning of a Test with the new ball
full outside off and pushed to the off side
fullish and pushed to the on side
he bangs it in short and he sways back and evades the bouncer
Kulasekara stayed at the crease and looked to smash it just about anywhere, nowhere near the pitch of it and he got a top edge that swirled to the off side, de Villiers takes the skier

the third for the over! This was the short ball and slower as well, Priyanjan had crossed the previous ball and took strike but he too fell to a top edge, swung too early and an easy one for AB running forward from mid-on
he opens the face and dabs it to third man
6.20pm:  drifts on the pads and he works it to midwicket
in the slot and too easy for Senanayake, pitched up outside off, mid-off was up and he lofts it clean over the infield
gets beside the line and he dabs it to third man
bangs it in short and he sways back and leaves it alone
bangs it in short on the body and he stays back and defends
down the track and he swivels and pulls but he is in an awkward position, mistimed to deep square leg
short outside off and he sways back and upper cuts it to third man
full on the pads and he shuffles and works it to deep midwicket
fires that full outside off and he makes room but misses
the short one was too good for Mendis, Mendis was down the track and he hung out the periscope after realising that he couldn't hook it, feathers the edge and de Kock appeals
lands it outside off and he tamely pokes his bat out
fires that full outside off and he drags it to the off side
So Sri Lanka don't last 50 overs after all, this was a fuller delivery and Malinga was looking to clear the rope down the ground, he picked long-on and SL have lost 5 wickets for 11 runs

inn2.comm: swings it on the pads and gently pushed wide of mid-on
he fires it full and he manages to dig it out to the off side
fuller one on the stumps and he gently pushes it to the off side
he gets beside the line and punches it to the off side
he swings it towards the pads but de Kock didn't read it and the ball clipped the pads
that's a stylish flick! Malinga swings it on the pads but it was a half volley and de Kock merely whipped it wide of midwicket
Kulasekara gets it to drift in sharply and Amla does well to cover the line and defend
good length outside off and he punches it down to cover
good length outside off and coming in, he punches it solidly to cover
three out of three to the covers, the ball drifts back in nicely and he times it well too
this was an uppish drive, swinging in and pitched up and he drives square and straight to backward point
misdirected the swing to the pads, too easy for Amla as he used his wrists well to flick it behind square, hardly any fielders there

he comes round the wicket and the ploy works straightaway! Bowled from slightly wide of the crease and he got it to angle back in sharply and de Kock was playing down the wrong line, hits the leg stump
he greets him with a quick bouncer, he quickly ducks under that
he lands it outside the off stump and angles it away and he leaves it alone
comes back in and he clips it away towards midwicket
he gives him a lot of width and he reaches out and pushes it to mid-off
fires that full on the stumps and close to the yorker length, he digs it out
slower ball on the pads and clipped with the angle down to fine leg
class from Amla! This was not a bad delivery, it swung it quite a bit but Amla played it late and flicked it away in front of square and wide of midwicket
Kulasekara gives him a bit too much width outside to free his arms, times the punch well and bisects the gap at backward point and cover
he stays behind the line and defends
clips it with the swing just wide of mid-on and they have to hurry the single, Kusal's throw would have caught Amla short had he hit the stumps
swings it back in and he stays behind the line and defends
swings it in and he stays beside the line and he pushes it to the off side
Malinga takes the gamble of bowling round the wicket to Amla who is strong on the on side, the angle is towards the pads and he uses his wrists well again as he flicks it wide of midwicket
he keeps it wide outside off and he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
loose delivery, wide outside off and kept low as well, Kallis didn't offer a shot
lands it wide outside off and he punches it towards cover

that's another failure for Kallis! The sharp bouncer leads to his downfall, Malinga reverts to over the wicket for Kallis, bangs it in short and Kallis can't resist the hook, there was a sound and Sangakkara threw the ball up as soon as he caught it, it was a good catch too
fires that full and he digs it out to the off side
he gets away with one that was wide outside off, cut straight to cover point
he fires that full outside off and he digs it out to the off side
he fires this one full and it swings in, he manages to dig it out
another glorious wristy flick, Kulasekara's inswing isn't troubling Amla at all, a bit too straight and played effortlessly wide of midwicket
tries to flick but gets an inside edge to the on side
wonderful square drive by AB, this was fired full and wide outside the off stump and he leans forward and pinches the gap wide of point
length ball outside off and defended
slower ball on the stumps and he works it to midwicket
brilliant save at fine leg by Kulasekara, this was banged in short on the body and he swivels and pulls him down to fine leg, Kula has to sprint to his left, slide and cut it off
wasn't in control of that pull, it was short of a length and he fetched that from off and it dropped just over midwicket
slower ball on the stumps and defended softly
flighted from around the wicket, clipped to midwicket
gorgeous! This was tossed up to lure him into a drive and Amla leans into it and has threaded it past short cover. Sublime timing
back over the wicket, this was on a good length and Amla whips it to short midwicket
inviting flight this time but Amla's content with with a push to long-on
pushed back to the bowler as Senanayake slows it up
oh, almost! AB was into the flick too early and this loopy offspinner travels uppishly but doesn't hang in the air long enough for short midwicket to come around
stands up tall and punches it down to mid-off
width on offer and AB slashes it to cover. Diving save keeps it to none
looks for the late cut, but this one doesn't bounce as much and he gets an inside edge on the bounce to the keeper
just back of a good length and AB answers it with a block
another inside edge for AB. Inspects his bat rather closely after his miscued cover drive finds point
gets across to off stump and blocks the fuller, slower delivery
gets his front leg outside off and works this tossed up delivery square of short midwicket
waits as long as he can and reads it off the pitch, tucking the good length ball to deep square leg with the turn
backs away and chops a shortish delivery to cover
gets to the pitch and pushes down the ground, Dilshan pulls out a dive to keep it to none
lovely, flowing extra cover drive! A little overpitched and he eased it through the gap. No one moved
flighted on and around off stump, Amla lunges forward and turns it away to square leg
tries a bouncer but Amla gets on top of it and keeps it down with a pull to deep midwicket
on the up and spanked through the covers. Seem's AB's got used to Mathews' pace. Got forward and unleashed a solid punch
ventures a little fuller and AB doesn't shy away from driving again. This time he hits it squarer and the sweeper keeps it to one
keeps it in the corridor but Amla angles his bat and tucks into a single to deep third man
into the block a little too early again, it seems. This good length ball wanders away to fine leg off the inside edge
a little more pace behind this bouncer ensures Amla ducks under it. And as the over ends, Mahela is at Mathews' ear
tossed up on middle, AB keeps it out
switches his line to off stump, AB gets forward and blocks
pushes to long-on and takes a breather at the non-strikers'
this was the one that doesn't turn! So close to the outside edge! Amla stretches forward and blocks with hard hands but only comes up with air
turn on the offspinner this time and Amla rides it to flick it away to long leg
good length ball on the stumps, Amla finds midwicket
gets forward and opens the face to beat a diving point
pushes back and flicks the shortish ball to short midwicket
this is a little slower but the length allows Amla to go back and punch to long-on
pushes it a little fuller and AB ticks it off his legs to deep midwicket
he was in front of all three stumps as he shuffled across, and the length ball stayed a touch low as well. But Amla is able to flick this away to long leg
he drops it short and he goes back at the crease, punches it to the off side
that straightened and squared him up! Don't ask me how that missed the edge and the off stump
down the track and he clips it softly towards mid-on
he gets forward and stabs it back to the bowler
drops it short and wide and he rocks back and cuts to sweeper cover
fullish on the pads and worked to mid-on
he stays back and pushes it towards mid-off
swings it back in and he works it to the on side
lovely shot to bring up his fifty! He gets width outside off, stays back and punches it away wide of backward point
almost pierced the gap again, this was full and wide and driven, mid-off timed the dive well
good length outside off and he stays back to defend
uppishly played and it nearly carried to the bowler, went between his legs and mid-off had to dive
drifts on the pads and the ball rolls away off the pads
drops it short and he gets on his knee and clubs it over square leg
he stays back and works it away to midwicket
he makes room and the ball turns, he punches it back to the bowler
he clips it with the turn to deep square leg and they hurry the second run
this is artistry from Amla, length ball outside off and he relies entirely on timing and placement there, a mere defensive push beats cover and the sweeper
he stays beside the line and punches it hard
outside off and he plays an uppish punch wide of backward point
Amla was in trouble there! This was punched wide of point and they were set for the second run but Amla not as quick off the blocks, a direct hit would have sent him back
pushed to the off side
AB shows he can time it as well as Hashim, length ball outside off, he stays behind the line and punches it wide of mid-off and cover
full on the pads and worked away wide of midwicket
flatter and worked off the pads
slower through the air and defended
down the track and clipped with the turn to deep midwicket
he clips it away with the turn down to fine leg
a bit too straight and easily knocked to fine leg again
very nearly found the boundary again, wide outside off and he cuts past the big gap on the off side, Priyanjan dives and cuts it off
the leg break and he drills it towards long-on
he stays back and punches it to mid-off
close call for Amla as he went forward and clipped it in the air, nobody at midwicket though
the legbreak on the pads, clipped wide of midwicket
fuller on the stumps and pushed down to long-on
another airy flick this time by AB but it drops short of square leg

huge relief for Sri Lanka as AB finds long-on with precision, it was flighted and AB was down the track but didn't loft with conviction, he feared the worst as soon as he hit it, Thisara takes it well in front of the rope
sharp turn and down the leg side, Sangakkara breaks the bails and he appeals for a stumping, Amla's back foot was behind all the time so he is safe
he tucks it away down to backward square leg
he cuts it to the off side
stays back and chops it towards point
fires it full and he drills it down to long-off

Sri Lanka get back in this with two in quick succession, Duminy this time perishing for playing the cut, this was the off break that was drifting wide of the left-hander, he chased it and Sangakkara takes the thick edge
flatter one and he gets forward and defends
slower through the air and he smothers the spin
tries to work it away but short leg comes in the way
the off break lands outside leg and he gets an outside edge that drops wide of slip
he comes well forward and defends
that may have been a drop and it was! Sangakkara gives Amla a life, this was spinning sharply and down the leg side and Amla clearly hit it, hit Sanga's gloves but he failed to hang on
he shuffles and tucks it to the on side
another drop and Priyanjan this time! This was tougher though, uppish cover drive and he flings himself to his right at short cover and can't pluck it
nicely done by Miller, slower through the air, he rocks back and cuts and beats point who dives

after two drops someone finally hangs on! What a freakish over this has been. Tossed up by Dilshan and inviting another drive, this was uppish again but Senanayake times his dive well at extra cover and takes the catch
he stays back and punches it to cover
flatter and quicker from Mendis and he gets an inside edge to the pad
sharp offbreak and he awkwardly defends
gets nicely behind the line and defends
he stays back at the crease and defends
zips off the pitch and he defends back to the bowler
the off break and he clips it against the turn
clips it with the turn behind square
full outside off and he drives
this was a poor ball, full toss down the leg side and he works it to fine leg
drifts on the pads and he works it to the leg side
fullish on the stumps and he pushes it to cover
flatter one and pushed to the on side
gets away with a short one, he tucks it to square leg
shot of desperation but he found the gap alright, full outside off and he leans forward and crashes it wide of mid-off
tucks it with the turn to the leg side
gets forward and defends to the leg side
works it to the leg side and calls for the single, McLaren to face the last ball
tossed up and he mistimes the drive to mid-off
fuller and pushed to the off side
clipped to midwicket
clips with the turn to square leg
tossed up and he pushes it with the turn to long-on
he stays back and cuts him wide of point
tossed up and he drives on the up wide of point
round the wicket and he comes forward and pushes it to cover
quicker through the air and he defends
doesn't give him room and he comes forward to defend
flatter one and he comes forward to defend

the pressure of four dot balls prompts this release shot and it is a very soft dismissal in the end, he tossed it up a bit more and gave him a bit more width, McLaren was looking at lofting it straighter and got a leading edge that lobbed to Kulasekara at point
stays back and clips it to mid-on, and it's a wicket maiden, Sri Lanka right on top
he makes room and cuts against the turn
tucks it with the turn down to square leg
he shuffles and clips it with the turn down to fine leg
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
gets forward and across and defends
Dilshan never too far from the spotlight today, it's a length ball outside off, Philander goes back looking to cut, thick edge and Sangakkara knew it, Dilshanset off with the airplane celebration
tossed up and he gets forward and drives to long-on
quicker through the air and he defends
tossed up and he comes forward to defend
gets forward and defends to the off side
comes round the wicket and he defends
this goes the other way and he chases it and misses
tossed up and he works it against the turn
flatter one and he clips it to square leg
comes forward and gets a leading edge to the off side
flatter one and he tucks it wide of midwicket
flatter one and he works it to square leg
this one spun the other way, skidded and he played the late cut wide of the keeper and down to third man
round the wicket and he strays wide down the leg side
gets forward and softly blocks it out
slower through the air and blocked
nothing passive about this shot! Full on the stumps and he freed his arms and drilled it wide of mid-off
stays back and defends
stays back and works it to the leg side
gets on his knee and sweeps him to the deep
stays back and clips it with the turn to square leg
stays back and punches against the turn to deep point
stays back and clips with the turn to midwicket
flatter and worked towards midwicket
this one straightened and beat the outside edge
gets forward and drops it to the off side
drops it a bit short and he punches it to long-on
stays back and punches it back to the bowler
gets an outside edge towards short third man and Amla was off in a flash
he drifts really wide down the leg side
stays back and works it with the turn to midwicket
goes for the drive and gets a big inside edge to the pad
tossed up and he goes for the loft, he just about clears mid-off and long-on dives in vain
he gives him width outside off and he cuts him down to square third man
a bit too straight and he tucks it away down to fine leg
he bangs it in short and he quickly ducks under that bouncer
tests him out with another bouncer, Steyn awkwardly gets his head out of the way

nearly had him there, Steyn gets a snorter on his chest and he fails to fend it off properly, lobs off the shoulder of the bat and drops in front of three fielders, including Mathews who runs forward and dives in vain
another snorter of a bouncer and Steyn backs away and the ball lobs off his shoulder and clears the keeper and slips
he gets well forward and defends
comes forward and punches him down to long-off
goes for the drive and he gets an inside edge to the leg side
this one really skids through and he punches it to mid-on
he gets beside the line and steers it wide of point
he tucks it with the turn to square leg
starts off full and wide outside off and he slashes it wide of deep cover, two more to Amla
slower ball on the pads and he wristily flicks it wide of midwicket, he doesn't take the run
he punches it hard straight to mid-off at the edge of the circle, not taking the single again
he strays down the leg side and wide called
that was a classic shot! Length ball on the middle stump, he punches it over mid-on, knew the fielder was up and the follow through was great too
the ball stops on him a bit and he stabs it to mid-off
it's a low full toss on the pads and he reaches his century! He also keeps the strike, single to deep square, no major celebrations because his team has its back to the wall, century under pressure
in the air and drops short! Strange shot, he brings out the slog and it's a top edge that drops short of deep square running in
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
he comes down the track, wants to hit it straight and he gets an outside edge that clears point, nobody there
poor ball as he strays down the leg side
makes the same mistake again, too wide down leg
gets forward and pushes it to the off side
South Africa are not giving up! Tossed up and Steyn gives the charge and lofts him over extra cover, making use of the powerplay
round the wicket and yet another wide down leg
full on the stumps and defended
it's a full toss and he swings and mistimes it wide of mid-on who dives but doesn't take the single

it's a full toss and Amla has holed out! On the body and he looks to swing it over the infield but a very easy catch for Senanayake at midwicket, they check if the ball was above waist height but it was within the limit
he gets a yorker and he digs it out back to the bowler
another yorker but this time Morkel couldn't keep it out, it was in fact the slower ball, Morkel played all around it and the ball struck the off stump

another yorker and there's a big shout for the lbw and he was not given, they review it, bizarrely the ball went under the bat, spun back in and hit the pads, not in front of the stumps though so he is safe
this time he keeps it out to the off side

Steyn's been given out lbw and Steyn is reviewing it, it was the googly, Steyn was trapped on the back foot, the ball hits the top flap of the pad first and then the bat, height was the doubt and Hawkeye shows the ball hitting the top of the off stump, umpire's call stands, Steyn's gone and that's the match
